about.title: Who is the program for?
about.subtitleLeft: You will fit in perfectly if:
about.subtitleRight: The program is NOT suitable if:
left: You don’t want to learn alone. With us, you gain access to a community of like-minded individuals where it's easy to find support, advice, and motivating friends.
You strive for success. Our programs are designed with market demands in mind, and we will help you build the skills that lead to your dream career.
You value practical experience. Instead of dry theory, we focus on real projects that you can add to your portfolio.
You are open to continuous learning and development. In IT, the ability to adapt is crucial, and with us, you will always be up to date with the latest technologies.
right: You are not ready to dedicate time to learning. Acquiring new knowledge takes time and energy, and success primarily depends on your engagement.
You are not interested in applying practical skills. Our programs are designed for those who are ready to dive into real tasks and actively use the knowledge gained.

You are looking for ready-made solutions. In IT, the ability to solve problems independently and adapt to new situations is essential; StartIT.uz is designed for those who are ready to grow and develop.

slides.name: Nargiza
slides.text: Here, I’m receiving quality education at an affordable price.

slides.name: Gulnora
slides.text: I have had consultations with two mentors about building a career in IT. They provided detailed answers to my questions and shared valuable resources.

slides.name: Sherzod
slides.text: I like how the courses are designed to integrate practical applications.

slides.name: Saodat
slides.text: The platform allows me to learn at my own pace and at times that are convenient for me.
